name: countmydays
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: count my days
des:
How many times were you curious to know the number of days you've lived till now? how many times you've surfed the internet manually for this? Why waste time when count my days could do it by just calling hey Alexa open count my days.Yes it's as simple as that.
Count My days will ask for your birthday,just once. And it'll never forget your birthday! And Everytime you wish to know which day in your life is this, this alexa skill will say it for you with a wish at the end.
Why not start your day with a cute little wish?
